author: FaeFox (Fae#0009)
install_msg:
Thanks for installing Duel! Please ensure that your bot has the applications.commands permission (granted from the discord developer portal before inviting your bot).
This cog contains only slash command(s).

NOTE: Discord may take up to an hour to register slash commands.
name: Duel
end_user_data_statement: This cog may store data such as member IDs to track what class a user has chosen.
